screens.description: Business Impact to Customer or Illumina reason text field is mandatory when the Impact is selected as Other.
screens.name: SelectReasonError
screens.label: SelectReasonError

fields.name: DisplaySelectReasonError
fields.fieldText:
Business Impact to Customer Reason field is mandatory when Impact is selected as 'Other'.


Go to the previous screen to update the field.

fields.name: DisplayIlluminaReasonError
fields.fieldText:
Business Impact to Illumina Reason field is mandatory when Impact is selected as 'Other'.


Go to the previous screen to update the field.

fields.name: DisplayResolutionDeadlineError
fields.fieldText:
Customer Resolution Target Date should not be less than Today's Date.


Go to the previous screen to update the field.

fields.name: LinkToElevationDataLength
fields.fieldText:
Link To Elevation Data field can accept only up to 1000 chars.


Go to the previous screen to update the field.

fields.name: UniqueTechElevationError
fields.fieldText: This Work Order already has a Technical Elevation. If a new one is required, create a new Business Issue Complaint case AND use the "Create Technical Elevation" button.

fields.name: LimitBusinessImpacttoCustomerReason
fields.fieldText:
The fields Business Impact to Customer Reason has a character limit of 255 which has been exceeded. Update the text to within the character limit and save.


ï»¿Go to the previous screen to update the field.

fields.name: LimitBusinessImpacttoIlluminaReason
fields.fieldText:
The field Business Impact to Illumina Reason has a character limit of 255 which has been exceeded. Update the text to within the character limit and save.


Go to the previous screen to update the field.

fields.name: Notes
fields.helpText:
This is the Notes field from the Work Order. Any changes added here will be

copied back to the Notes field on the Work Order.

fields.name: NoteText
fields.fieldText: Notes Field: Provide reason for elevating, background on the issue, and what's been done to date.

fields.name: Related_Work_Order_s
fields.helpText: Please fill in related Work Order(s) for this Account if this is not the first occurrence of this issue.
